pr_title: Implement pass through mode UNION ALL on Presto-on-Spark

timeline.bodyText:
Do you think at this point we can simply remove the prefer-distributed-union property? As it was added as a hack originally.
CC: @wenleix
timeline.author: arhimondr

replies.bodyText: prefer-distributed-union can be removed. Let's do it later, because if this PR broke anything, we have an option to use single mode union
replies.author: viczhang861

replies.bodyText: Let's at least enable the prefer-distributed-union by default here: https://github.com/prestodb/presto/blob/master/presto-spark-base/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/spark/PrestoSparkSettingsRequirements.java#L98
replies.author: arhimondr

replies.bodyText: Also remove the setting override in the integration tests: https://github.com/prestodb/presto/blob/master/presto-spark-testing/src/test/java/com/facebook/presto/spark/testing/TestPrestoSparkLauncherIntegrationSmokeTest.java#L151
replies.author: arhimondr

replies.bodyText: Yeah, sounds good to just remove it.
replies.author: wenleix

timeline.bodyText: This looks a little bit like a hack. Should we set it to real number of the output partitions (hashPartitionCount)?
timeline.author: arhimondr

replies.bodyText: Yes, we can use hashPartitionCount, the performance overhead (create a large unnecessary array for a small partitionId like 1) should be negligible.
replies.author: viczhang861

timeline.message:
Implement pass through mode UNION ALL on Presto-on-Spark

Instead of round robin shuffle at row level for UNION ALL, all rows on
the same partition are passed through current partition and sent to
next fragment where partition id is determined by a modular hash
function.

function.

timeline.author: arhimondr

timeline.bodyText: Let's simply remove this override (since it is default now)
timeline.author: arhimondr

timeline.bodyText: nit: maybe add a check state about partitionId < partitionCount?
